oai_dc:dc.dc:title: OBiS : Optical Bit Switcing - a switch architecture for Optical Omnipresent Ethernet
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GUMASTE, A
MEHTA, S
RANA, S
DAS, T
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Omnipresent Ethernet architecture has been proposed for end-to-end communication using pure Ethernet. We extend the scheme to an all-optical variant that supports a novel scheme called optical bit-switching which is verified through simulations. (C)2010 Optical Society of America.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: 2010 CONFERENCE ON OPTICAL FIBER COMMUNICATION OFC COLLOCATED NATIONAL FIBER OPTIC ENGINEERS CONFERENCE OFC-NFOEC,-
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Conference on Optital Fiber Communication (OFC)/Collocated National Fiber Optic Engineers (NFOEC),San Diego, CA,JUN 21-25, 2010
